description: Dashboard for Kafka and KRaft based on JMX Exporter

panels.description: Number of brokers online
panels.title: Brokers Online

panels.description: Number of active controllers in the cluster.
panels.title: Active Controllers

panels.description: The total number of topics.
panels.title: Total of Topics

panels.description: Number of replicas that are online.
panels.title: Online Replicas

panels.description: Number of partitions that donâ€™t have an active leader and are hence not writable or readable.
panels.title: Offline Partitions

panels.description: Number of under-replicated partitions (| ISR | < | all replicas |).
panels.title: Under Replicated Partitions

panels.description: Number of partitions which are at their minimum in sync replica count (| ISR | == | min.insync.replicas |).
panels.title: Partitions at minimum ISR

panels.description: Number of partitions which are under their minimum in sync replica count (| ISR | < | min.insync.replicas |).
panels.title: Partitions under minimum ISR

panels.description: The role of the node in KRaft

targets.expr: max by (instance, juju_unit, juju_model, juju_model_uuid, state) (kafka_server_raft_metrics_current_state_info{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"})

panels.title: Current Raft State

panels.description: The current quorum leader's id for the cluster; -1 indicates unknown.
panels.title: Current Quorum Leader

panels.description: The current voted leader's id for each kafka node; -1 indicates not voted for anyone.
panels.title: Current Voted Leader

panels.description: The current quorum epoch for the cluster.
panels.title: Current Quorum Epoch

panels.description: The average number of records appended per second as the leader of the raft quorum.
panels.title: Append Metadata Records Rate

panels.description: The average number of records fetched from the leader of the raft quorum.
panels.title: Fetch Metadata Records Rate

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds to commit an entry in the raft log.
panels.title: Metadata Records Commit Latency
Partitions Replicas Count Per Broker and Topic

panels.description: The in and out per broker for the cluster.
panels.title: In / Out Per Broker

panels.description: The in and out per topic for the cluster.
panels.title: In / Out Per Topic

panels.description: The number of bytes read off all sockets per second.
panels.title: Metadata Topic Incoming Bytes Rate

panels.description: The number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers per second.
panels.title: Metadata Topic Outgoing Bytes Rate

panels.description: The number of requests sent per second.
panels.title: Metadata Topic Requests Rate

panels.description: The number of responses received per second.
panels.title: Metadata Topic Responses Rate

panels.description: Produce request rate per broker.
panels.title: Produce Request Rate Per Broker

panels.description: Fetch request rate per broker.
panels.title: Fetch Request Rate Per Broker

panels.description: Produce request rate per topic.
panels.title: Produce Request Rate Per Topic

panels.description: Fetch request rate per topic
panels.title: Fetch Request Rate Per Topic

panels.description: Average percentage of time network processor is idle.
panels.title: Network Processor Avg Idle Percent

panels.description: Average percentage of time request handler threads are idle.
panels.title: Request Handler Avg Idle Percent

panels.description: The 99th quantile of produce latency per broker.
panels.title: Produce Latency 99th Per Broker

panels.description: The 99th quantile of fetch consumer latency per broker.
panels.title: Fetch Consumer Latency 99th Per Broker

panels.description: The 99th quantile of fetch follow latency per broker.
panels.title: Fetch Follow Latency 99th Per Broker

panels.description: Disk writes.
panels.title: Disk Writes

panels.description: Disk reads.
panels.title: Disk Reads

panels.description: The log size for each broker.
panels.title: Kafka Log Size By Broker (Disk Space Utilization)

panels.description: The log size for each topic.
panels.title: Kafka Log Size By Topic

panels.description: The high watermark maintained on this member; -1 if it is unknown.
panels.title: High Watermark

panels.description: The current raft log end offset.
panels.title: Log End Offset

panels.description: The failed produce request rate per broker.
panels.title: Failed Produce Request Per Broker

panels.description: The failed fetch request rate per broker.
panels.title: Failed Fetch Request Per Broker

panels.description: The in sync replicas shrinks and expand rate.
panels.title: Isr Shrinks / Isr Expands Per Second

panels.description: The rate of kafka elects a new leader for a partition from replicas that are not part of the In-Sync Replica (ISR) set.
panels.title: Unclean Leader Election Rate

panels.description: JVM Memory Used.
panels.title: JVM Memory Used

panels.description: JVM GC Time.
panels.title: JVM GC Time

panels.description: JVM thread count.
panels.title: JVM Thread Count

panels.description: JVM GC Count.
panels.title: JVM GC Count

title: Kafka
